name: Cut from Whole Cloth
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 45 "Start from Nothing" Game Jam.

Create new clothes from scratch by following the four rules of tailoring:

  1. Discuss: hear your client's needs
  2. Design: measure and cut to specification
  3. Dress: layer materials on the model
  4. Display: show off your work

Start from nothing and see if you can become the ultimate tailor!

Ludum Dare Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/cut-from-whole-cloth
